flawed_nl_solution:
Dustin reads 12.5 pages a minute because 75 / 60 = <<75/60=12.5>>12.5
Dustin reads 500 pages in 40 minutes because 40 x 12.5 = <<40*12.5=500>>500
Sam reads 0.4 pages a minute because 24 / 60 = <<24/60=0.4>>0.4
Sam reads 16 pages in 40 minutes because 40 x 0.4 = <<40*0.4=16>>16
Dustin reads 484 more pages than Sam because 500 - 16 = <<500-16=484>>484
#### 484

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1.25, not 12.5. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
